Un angolo di paradiso tra i limoni della: A corner of paradise among the lemon groves of the Amalfi Coast
un rifugio esclusivo nato da una complet: an exclusive retreat born from a complete renovation and immersed in the tranquility of a fragrant lemon grove. Here, luxury, comfort, and nature meet to offer you a rejuvenating stay.
Perfetta per famiglie, gruppi di amici,: Perfect for families, groups of friends, couples, and anyone wishing for a rejuvenating break in the tranquility of the Amalfi Coast, without sacrificing comfort.
ü§ù Il proprietario √® sempre presente: ü§ù The owner is always present to ensure a warm welcome and constant support during your stay
‚Ä¢ 3 camere da letto climatizzate, lumi: ‚Ä¢ 3 air-conditioned, bright, and tastefully furnished bedrooms
‚Ä¢ 2 bagni moderni con spaziosi piatti: ‚Ä¢ 2 modern bathrooms with spacious shower trays
‚Ä¢ Zona giorno con ampio open space con: ‚Ä¢ Living area with large open space with sofa bed and fully equipped kitchen
‚Ä¢ Aria condizionata in ogni camera per: ‚Ä¢ Air conditioning in every room for maximum comfort
‚Ä¢ Cucina esterna coperta per pranzi e: ‚Ä¢ Covered outdoor kitchen for outdoor lunches and dinners.
‚Ä¢ Doccia esterna, perfetta per rinfres: ‚Ä¢ Outdoor shower, perfect for cooling off after a day at the sea or hiking
La struttura si trova in una zona collin: The property is located in a quiet hilly area, surrounded by greenery. Accessible via about 200 steps, historically used by the 'formichelle' (little ants), the women who transported lemons. An authentic experience and an unforgettable view, ideal for lovers of tranquility.
Ogni dettaglio di VINCANTO √® pensato pe: Every detail of VINCANTO is designed to offer you an unforgettable stay. The completely renovated interiors combine contemporary design and quality materials: elegant porcelain stoneware floors and coverings, refined furnishings, and high-quality finishes. The new PVC window frames ensure silence and comfort, while mosquito nets on doors and windows allow you to enjoy the countryside breeze in total relaxation.
La struttura dispone di tre camere matri: The property features three bright and welcoming King Size double bedrooms, and two modern and functional bathrooms for maximum comfort and privacy. The fully equipped open-space kitchen is perfect for sharing convivial moments and preparing your favorite dishes.
Immersa nel cuore profumato di un limone: Immersed in the fragrant heart of a typical Amalfi Coast lemon grove
La casa, spaziosa e accogliente, si comp: The spacious and welcoming house consists of a large living area with a fully equipped open-space kitchen, ideal for sharing moments with family or friends. It has three comfortable and tastefully furnished bedrooms, and two full bathrooms, both with large shower trays.
All‚Äôesterno, gli ospiti possono godere: Outside, guests can enjoy an outdoor kitchen, perfect for outdoor lunches and dinners under the pergola, overlooking the surrounding greenery. Completing the offer are an outdoor shower, a traditional wood-fired oven, and a barbecue, ideal for convivial evenings immersed in the scent of lemons and the sea.
Situati a soli 2 km dal centro paese, go: Located just 2 km from the town center, enjoy the tranquility of the countryside with the convenience of nearby services, easily accessible also thanks to the municipal shuttle service and public buses.
L'accesso a VINCANTO avviene attraverso: Access to VINCANTO is via a staircase of about 200 steps, a picturesque path winding through the greenery. We consider these steps part of the authentic charm of the place, a small 'path of the formichelle' (little ants), historically used by women carrying precious lemons. Climbing them will reward you with a priceless view and the feeling of reaching a hidden corner of paradise, far from the daily hustle and bustle. It is an invitation to slow down, connect with nature, and enjoy the peace that only places like this can offer.
8 min dal porto di Maiori (6 min dal lun: 8 min from Maiori port (6 min from the seafront)

- Servizi inclusi nel prezzo: aria condi: - Services included in the price: air conditioning, Wi-Fi internet, washing machine use.
Il comune di Maiori (SA) applica una tas: The municipality of Maiori (SA) applies a tourist tax for each overnight stay, from January 1st to December 31st of each year, to help improve tourist services.
Esenzioni: Sono esenti i minori di 14 a: Exemptions: Children under 14 years of age are exempt
Pagamento: La tassa non √® inclusa nel: Payment: The tax is not included in the cost of the stay and must be paid directly at our facility, upon your arrival or departure.
